languages.text: "Появление Несущих Слово на Кьяве Гамма — тревожный знак. Еще тревожнее этого — то, как легко Фабрикатор-Цензор поддался на посулы еретиков".
"The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."
languages.original_text: "Появление Несущих Слово на Кьяве Гамма — тревожный знак. Еще тревожнее этого — то, как легко Фабрикатор-Цензор поддался на посулы еретиков".

traits.locale_text: "The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."

traits.locale_text: "The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “怀言者出现在了基亚瓦伽马星，这固然令人深感不安，但更令人不安的是，铸造审查师竟然如此轻易地听信了异端分子的花言巧语。”
languages.original_text: "The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."

traits.locale_text: “怀言者出现在了基亚瓦伽马星，这固然令人深感不安，但更令人不安的是，铸造审查师竟然如此轻易地听信了异端分子的花言巧语。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « L'apparence des Word Bearers sur Kiava Gamma est un signe des plus troublants. Sans parler de la facilité avec laquelle le fabricator-censeur s'est laissé séduire par la flatterie des hérétiques... »
languages.original_text: "The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."

traits.locale_text: « L'apparence des Word Bearers sur Kiava Gamma est un signe des plus troublants. Sans parler de la facilité avec laquelle le fabricator-censeur s'est laissé séduire par la flatterie des hérétiques... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «La aparición de los Portadores de la Palabra en Kiava Gamma es una señal preocupante. Peor aún es la facilidad con la que el fabricator-censor sucumbió a las tentaciones de los herejes».
languages.original_text: "The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."

traits.locale_text: «La aparición de los Portadores de la Palabra en Kiava Gamma es una señal preocupante. Peor aún es la facilidad con la que el fabricator-censor sucumbió a las tentaciones de los herejes».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマにワードベアラーが現れたということは、厄介事のサインだ。ますます難題が増え、ファブリケーター・センサーは容易に”甘言”の異端に屈するぞ」
languages.original_text: "The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマにワードベアラーが現れたということは、厄介事のサインだ。ますます難題が増え、ファブリケーター・センサーは容易に”甘言”の異端に屈するぞ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das Erscheinen der Word Bearers auf Kiava Gamma ist ein beunruhigendes Zeichen. Noch beunruhigender ist, wie leicht der Fabricator-Zensor den Schmeicheleien der Ketzer erlegen ist."
languages.original_text: "The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."

traits.locale_text: "Das Erscheinen der Word Bearers auf Kiava Gamma ist ein beunruhigendes Zeichen. Noch beunruhigender ist, wie leicht der Fabricator-Zensor den Schmeicheleien der Ketzer erlegen ist."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."

languages.text: "Vahyedenler'in Kiava Gama'da belirmesi, can sıkıcı bir işaret Asıl can sıkıcı olan ise Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün kâfirlerin cazibesine bu kadar kolay kapılması."
languages.original_text: "The appearance of the Word Bearers on Kiava Gamma is a troubling sign. Even more troubling is how easily the Fabricator-Censor succumbed to the heretics' blandishments."

traits.locale_text: "Vahyedenler'in Kiava Gama'da belirmesi, can sıkıcı bir işaret Asıl can sıkıcı olan ise Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün kâfirlerin cazibesine bu kadar kolay kapılması."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
